title: Account Transfer
body:
**I'm asking if the league open account transfer soon after the beta update, also is there any free transfer coming, coz i need to transfer my acc from  NA  .. and i don't have enough   PR ..  please 
i'm waiting to play coz NA is too far for me and im from Egypt in need to change server .. 
**

replies.body:
Account transfers aren't available in the Beta Client, but you can access them from the Legacy Client if you launch into it at the login screen as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I'm not aware of any free transfers going on at the moment, but let me know if you have any other questions.

Hello,  I would like to ask you a question.
I am currently on EU Nordic and East server. I want to transfer to EU West server, but on EU West I already have an account with exactly same name as account on EU Nordic and East, and I played few games. How my transfer from EU Nordic and East, will affect the account that I have on EU West?

When you transfer to another server, you're prompted to select a new username or Summoner name if there's already another by the same name on the new server you're transferring to. Check out our [Transfer FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ) for more details on what occurs when you transfer.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Oh thank you!
I was searching for the answer for the same question!!
* ah this was answer for 12months ago ...
since the legacy client has been retired , i guess i have to wait for their update...
